channel.title: Random error that closes client
channel.description:
As far as I can tell I get this error at random intervals. Any help would be great.
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 711 at Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4.method390(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4.java:277) at client.method125(client.java:9478) at client.method112(client.java:8854) at client.method146(client.java:12173) at client.method102(client.java:7874) at client.method9(client.java:8772) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:123) at client.run(client.java:4588) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:680) [/code]

item.title: Random error that closes client
item.dc:creator: @darkangel996 darkangel996
item.description:
@darkangel996 wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:4, topic:389604”]You might be trying to go 711gp over the MAX_ITEM_AMOUNT integer, but I doubt it considering you’re using an arrow and fighter torso.

Your code is just not optimized, nothing you can do unless you know exactly what’s causing it or re-write the server or get a client that works.[/quote]

fixed

Read full topic

item.title: Random error that closes client
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You might be trying to go 711gp over the MAX_ITEM_AMOUNT integer, but I doubt it considering you’re using an arrow and fighter torso.

Your code is just not optimized, nothing you can do unless you know exactly what’s causing it or re-write the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Random error that closes client
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

First it happened whenever I equipped an arrow.

Then it happened when I equipped a fighter torso (which has never caused problems before).

Both times I was holding 2147m…could that maybe crash the client? :S

Read full topic

item.title: Random error that closes client
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

You’re probably clicking/using/walking somewhere that is out of bounds. So a number is probably set to low for what you are able to do in the server. Try catching the error when it happens and see what you did just before.

Read full topic
